statements: SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_id, points FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, rewards FROM loyalty_program WHERE points > 100 ORDER BY points ASC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, points, rewards FROM loyalty_program WHERE rewards IS NOT NULL ORDER BY rewards DESC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, points FROM loyalty_program WHERE points > 100 ORDER BY points DESC;
SELECT customer_id, rewards FROM loyalty_program WHERE rewards IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, points, rewards FROM loyalty_program WHERE points > 50 AND rewards LIKE '%discount%';
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY points ASC, customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_points;
SELECT customer_id, total_points FROM customer_points WHERE total_points > 100;
SELECT reward_name FROM rewards WHERE required_points <= 500;
SELECT customer_id, total_points, reward_name FROM customer_points JOIN rewards ON total_points >= required_points;
SELECT customer_id, sum(total_points) AS total_points_sum FROM customer_points GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_points WHERE total_points > 1000
SELECT customer_id, total_points FROM customer_points ORDER BY total_points DESC
SELECT reward_name, required_points FROM rewards WHERE required_points < 500
SELECT customer_id, total_points, reward_name FROM customer_points JOIN rewards ON customer_points.total_points >= rewards.required_points
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_points) AS total_points FROM customer_points GROUP BY customer_id HAVING SUM(total_points) > 2000
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM points ORDER BY points DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(points) AS total_points FROM points GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT reward_name, points_required FROM rewards WHERE points_required < 100;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM points WHERE points > 100 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT rewards.reward_name, rewards.points_required, customers.name FROM rewards INNER JOIN customers ON rewards.points_required < points.points;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE name LIKE '%D%';
SELECT customers.name, points.points FROM customers JOIN points ON customers.customer_id = points.customer_id WHERE points.points >= 500 ORDER BY points.points DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, points FROM customers WHERE points > 100;
SELECT reward_name, point_cost FROM rewards ORDER BY point_cost DESC;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_date FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, points_change, history_date FROM customers JOIN points_history ON customers.customer_id = points_history.customer_id WHERE points_change < 0 ORDER BY history_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, points FROM customers WHERE points > 100 ORDER BY points DESC;
SELECT customer_name, reward_name, point_cost FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id JOIN rewards ON transactions.reward_id = rewards.reward_id;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(points_change) AS total_points FROM customers JOIN points_history ON customers.customer_id = points_history.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, points, transaction_date FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customer;
SELECT name, email FROM customer;
SELECT program_name, start_date FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT reward_name, required_points, expiration_date FROM rewards WHERE required_points > 100 ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, points, transaction_date FROM points WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name FROM customer;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(points) AS total_points FROM points GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_points > 100;

SELECT customer.name, rewards.reward_name, redeemed_rewards.redeemed_date FROM customer JOIN redeemed_rewards ON customer.customer_id = redeemed_rewards.customer_id JOIN rewards ON redeemed_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id;
SELECT * FROM points WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
